    • createLog

      public int createLog(String user, String actionType, String file) throws SQLException
      Creates a new journalisation entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who performed the action
      actionType - the type of action (CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE, etc.)
      file - the path of the affected file
      Returns:
      the id of the created entry, or -1 if an error occurs
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getLogById

      public Map<String,Object> getLogById(int id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a journalisation entry by its id (READ)
      Parameters:
      id - the entry id
      Returns:
      a Map containing the entry data, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateLog

      public boolean updateLog(int id, String user, String actionType, String file)
      Updates a journalisation entry (UPDATE)
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the entry to update
      user - the new user
      actionType - the new action type
      file - the new file
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeded, false otherwise

    • deleteLog

      public boolean deleteLog(int id) throws SQLException
      Deletes a journalisation entry (DELETE)
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the entry to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion succeeded, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException
